timeline.Title: Frelimo's Governance Start
timeline.Text: Frelimo has governed Mozambique since its independence from Portugal in 1975.
timeline.Source: Frelimo, which has governed Mozambique since its independence from Portugal in 1975.

timeline.Title: Contested Election Date
timeline.Text: The contested election took place on 9 October.
timeline.Source: Their deaths come as country waits for the results of the contested 9 October election.
timeline.Context: Explicit date mentioned in the narrative.

timeline.Title: Murder of Opposition Figures
timeline.Text: Elvino Dias and Paulo Guambe were gunned down late on Friday night.
timeline.Source: They were gunned down late on Friday night by attackers chasing the car they were travelling in.
timeline.Context: Publication date 2024-10-20 minus 2 days = 2024-10-18 for 'Friday night'

timeline.Title: Nationwide Strike Call
timeline.Text: Podemos has called for a nationwide strike on Monday.
timeline.Source: Opposition parties have also cried fraud, and Podemos has called for a nationwide strike on Monday.

timeline.Title: Election Results Announcement
timeline.Text: The results of the election are due on 24 October.
timeline.Source: They are due on the 24 October, with provisional results showing a probable win for Frelimo.
timeline.Context: Explicit date mentioned in the narrative.
